meanings.definition: A person who formally declares their abandonment of a belief or claim.
meanings.sent1: The renouncer of the old traditions was now embracing modern ideas.
meanings.sent2: The renouncer of his title shocked everyone with his decision.
meanings.sent3: The renouncer of desserts suddenly craved a piece of cake.
meanings.sent4: She was a renouncer of negativity, always seeking the bright side of things.
meanings.sent5: The renouncer of fear faced every challenge with courage.

meanings.definition: To formally declare one's abandonment of a belief or claim.
meanings.sent1: He decided to renounce his membership in the club.
meanings.sent2: She renounced her allegiance to the old regime.
meanings.sent3: The cat renounced its plan to catch the mouse and took a nap instead.
meanings.sent4: The renouncing of his past mistakes allowed him to move forward.
meanings.sent5: She renounced her fear of public speaking and gave a confident presentation.
